Agent - Class in tic_tac_toe
Abstract class providing a skeletal implementation of the tic-tac-toe-playing agent
Agent() - Constructor for class tic_tac_toe.Agent
Constructor for a tic-tac-toe-playing agent
AgentLevel0 - Class in tic_tac_toe
Class implementing level 0 of the tic-tac-toe-playing agent, which uses a random number generator to choose random valid moves for the agent
AgentLevel0() - Constructor for class tic_tac_toe.AgentLevel0
Creates the level 0 of the tic-tac-toe-playing agent, which which uses a random number generator to choose random valid moves for the agent
AgentLevel1 - Class in tic_tac_toe
Class implementing level 1 of the tic-tac-toe-playing agent, which uses a hard-coded set of conditions to choose the best move for the agent
AgentLevel1() - Constructor for class tic_tac_toe.AgentLevel1
Creates the level 1 of the tic-tac-toe-playing agent, which which uses a hard-coded set of conditions to choose the best move for the agent
AgentLevel2 - Class in tic_tac_toe
Class implementing level 2 of the tic-tac-toe-playing agent, which employs the regular minimax algorithm (a depth-first search strategy for adversarial games) and features a complete adversarial search
AgentLevel2() - Constructor for class tic_tac_toe.AgentLevel2
Creates the level 2 of the tic-tac-toe-playing agent, which employs the regular minimax algorithm and features a complete adversarial search
AgentLevel3 - Class in tic_tac_toe
Class implementing level 3 of the tic-tac-toe-playing agent, which employs the regular minimax algorithm (a depth-first search strategy for adversarial games) and features a reduced search space resulting from alpha-beta pruning
AgentLevel3() - Constructor for class tic_tac_toe.AgentLevel3
Creates the level 3 of the tic-tac-toe-playing agent, which employs the regular minimax algorithm and features a reduced search space resulting from alpha-beta pruning
AgentLevel4 - Class in tic_tac_toe
Class implementing level 4 of the tic-tac-toe-playing agent, which employs a depth-sensitive minimax algorithm (a depth-first search strategy for adversarial games) and features a complete adversarial search
AgentLevel4() - Constructor for class tic_tac_toe.AgentLevel4
Creates the level 4 of the tic-tac-toe-playing agent, which employs a depth-sensitive minimax algorithm and features a complete adversarial search
AgentLevel5 - Class in tic_tac_toe
Class implementing level 5 of the tic-tac-toe-playing agent, which employs a depth-sensitive minimax algorithm (a depth-first search strategy for adversarial games) and features a reduced search space resulting from alpha-beta pruning
AgentLevel5() - Constructor for class tic_tac_toe.AgentLevel5
Creates the level 5 of the tic-tac-toe-playing agent, which employs a depth-sensitive minimax algorithm and features a reduced search space resulting from alpha-beta pruning
